name: SandbagMaster
description:
This is my first game, very short game (or long if you want) with scores and characters from smash series like Sandbag and Master Hand.
  • The music in the game is NES Boss by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)
  • I made the sprite of the Hand, Sandbag and the Bullet
  • The backgrounds in the menú and gaqme is generated with Pixel Space Background Generator by Deep-Fold (https://deep-fold.itch.io/space-background-generator)
